body_html: Hello, I have found the same error when I add c++ random include in a .cu file (compiled by nvcc CUDA 8). This file random (/usr/include/c++/5/random in GNU/Debian 9) includes opt_random.h -> x86intrin.h -> immintrin.h -> avx512vlintrin.h. I don't have this problem when I compile with debug flags in nvcc (-g -O0). Finally I solved this problem changing include dependences in my application.

body: Hello, I have found the same error when I add c++ random include in a .cu file (compiled by nvcc CUDA 8). This file random (/usr/include/c++/5/random in GNU/Debian 9) includes opt_random.h -> x86intrin.h -> immintrin.h -> avx512vlintrin.h. I don't have this problem when I compile with debug flags in nvcc (-g -O0). Finally I solved this problem changing include dependences in my application.
